Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

CHAPTER 840 Sexually Oriented Businesses

840.01Purpose and intent. 840.02Definitions. 840.03Establishment and classification of businesses regulated. 840.04Measurement of distance. 840.05Location of sexually oriented businesses. 840.06Injunction. 840.07Sexually oriented business permit; purpose and intent. 840.08Permit required. 840.09Investigation and application. 840.10Issuance of permit. 840.11Annual permit fee. 840.12Inspection. 840.13Expiration of permit. 840.14Suspension of permit. 840.15Revocation of permit. 840.16Judicial review of permit denial, suspension or revocation. 840.17Transfer of permit. 840.18Sexually oriented business employee license. 840.19Exhibition of sexually explicit films or video booths. 840.20Prohibitions regarding minors and sexually oriented businesses. 840.21Advertising and lighting regulations. 840.22Hours of operation. 840.23Nudity at sexually oriented businesses prohibited. 840.24Additional criminal prohibitions for operation without valid permit. 840.25Exemptions. 840.26Criminal penalties; additional legal, equitable and injunctive relief. 840.27Immunity from prosecution. 840.28Severability. 840.29Conflicting ordinances repealed. 840.99Penalty.
